businessUsage: Automated quality control for manufacturing defects in electronics components.
keyActivity: Detecting anomalies and defects in circuit boards through image analysis.

metrics.metricDescription: Time taken to analyze each image.
Balanced measure of relevance and completeness.

modelDescription: A CNN model fine-tuned on a dataset of electronic component images to identify manufacturing defects.
modelOutput: Defect classification (e.g., crack, solder issue, missing component), confidence score.
modelPurpose: Reduce defect rates and improve product quality.
modelSummary: The model automatically identifies defects in electronic components, minimizing human error.
modelUsage: Used in the quality control process to automatically inspect components.

businessUsage: Automated response generation for customer support tickets.
keyActivity: Generating automated responses to customer inquiries to improve response times.

metrics.metricDescription: Measure of how well the generated response answers the customer query.
Time taken to generate and deliver the response.
Customer feedback on the usefulness of the responses.

modelDescription: A language model that automatically generates responses to customer support tickets.
modelOutput: Automated response to the customer ticket.
modelPurpose: Reduce response times and improve customer satisfaction.
modelSummary: The AI assistant generates responses to customer support tickets, improving efficiency.
modelUsage: The model is integrated with the customer support platform.

businessUsage: Predicting future sales trends for inventory management.
keyActivity: Predicting future sales to optimize inventory levels and reduce costs.

metrics.metricDescription: Mean Absolute Percentage Error for forecast accuracy.
Root Mean Squared Error measuring forecast errors.
Measure of fit for the regression model.

modelDescription: A time series model that forecasts sales based on historical data.
modelOutput: Predicted sales volumes for future periods.
modelPurpose: Optimize inventory levels and reduce holding costs.
modelSummary: The model provides accurate sales forecasts to optimize inventory.
modelUsage: Used to inform inventory planning and procurement.

businessUsage: Automated trading strategies in financial markets.
keyActivity: Developing algorithmic trading strategies to maximize profits.

metrics.metricDescription: Peak-to-trough decline during a specific period.

modelDescription: A reinforcement learning agent that optimizes trading decisions.
modelSummary: The AI agent optimizes trading strategies to maximize returns.
modelUsage: The model will be used for automated trading.

businessUsage: Predicting customer churn to proactively retain customers.
keyActivity: Predicting customer churn and identifying at-risk customers.

metrics.metricDescription: Area under the ROC curve measuring model's performance.
Completeness in detecting all churn cases.

modelDescription: An ensemble model predicting customer churn based on various features.
modelInput: Customer demographics, usage data, engagement metrics.
modelPurpose: Identify and proactively engage at-risk customers.
modelSummary: The model identifies customers likely to churn for targeted retention efforts.
modelUsage: Used to inform customer retention strategies and outreach.
platform: Python, Scikit-learn, Azure Machine Learning Studio
